text: Keith Ian Carradine (born August 8, 1949) is an American movie and television actor and singer. He is known for his roles as Tom Frank in Robert Altman's Nashville, Wild Bill Hickok in the HBO series Deadwood and FBI agent Frank Lundy in Dexter. In 1976, Carradine won the Academy Award for Best Original Song for I'm Easy. That song was in the movie Nashville. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * *Official site Mindgame *BroadwayWorld.com interview with Keith Carradine, October 16, 2008 Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from San Mateo County, California Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Singers from California Category:People from San Mateo, California Category:Best Original Song Academy Award-winning songwriters
title: Keith Carradine
